SENT.plain: Myelodysplastic syndrome is a preleukemic, clonal disorder of the hematopoetic stem cell
Cutaneous manifestations include infections, vasculitis, neutrophilic dermatoses, and leukemia cutis
Senile purpura is a common condition occurring in elderly individuals who lack other systemic or hematologic diseases
We present a case of myelodysplastic syndrome in which cutaneous lesions resembling senile purpura were the initial clinical manifestation
